info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 1 at 7:56PM CDT until November 1 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Brownsville TX
info.description:
SVRBRO
The National Weather Service in Brownsville has issued a
* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Kenedy County in Deep South Texas...
* Until 900 PM CDT.
* At 754 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Riviera, or 7 miles northwest of Sarita, moving southeast at 20 mph.
THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR NORTH-CENTRAL KENEDY COUNTY.
HAZARD...Baseball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts.
SOURCE...Radar indicated.
IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles.
* This severe thunderstorm will be near... Sarita and Kenedy County Sheriffs Office around 800 PM CDT.
info.instruction:
For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature's leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

parameter.value: NWS:DESTRUCTIVE HAIL STORM in this area til 900 PM CDT. Take shelter now. Check media.

National Weather Service: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING in effect for this area until 9:00 PM CDT for DESTRUCTIVE baseball size hail. Take shelter in a sturdy building, away from windows. People and animals outdoors will be severely injured.

parameter.value: SNM:TORMENTA DE GRANIZO DESTRUCTIVA en esta area hasta 900 PM CDT. Tome refugio ahora

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE TORMENTA SEVERA en efecto para esta area hasta las 9:00 PM CDT por granizo DESTRUCTIVO del tamano de una pelota de beisbol. Tome refugio en un edificio, alejado de las ventanas. Las personas y los animales al aire libre seran gravemente heridos.
